document.full_text: babies who are breastfed are less likely to grow into children with behavior problems by the time they reach the age of five than those who receive formula milk, scientists said on tuesday.
document.title: fewer behavior problems for breastfed kids: study
lines_and_colors: babies who are breastfed are less likely to grow into children with behavior problems by the time they reach the age of five than those who receive formula milk, scientists said on tuesday.
